screenshot.caption: MLT file open in Meltytech Shotcut 19

description: To create a new project in Shotcut, select File → New . After modifying the project, a user can save the information in an MLT file by selecting File → Save or Save As... . After saving a project, a user can close the project then reopen it later for further editing.

Users can also export Shotcut projects saved in MLT files to various media formats, including .MP4 and .WMV video, .MP3 and .AAC audio, and .JPG and .PNG images. To export a project to a different format, select File → Export Video... or Export Frame... .

NOTE: While an MLT project file should only be opened with Shotcut, it can also be opened with an XML editor to view the settings in XML format. However, the MLT file should not be modified with an XML editor, since editing the contents will most likely cause the file to become corrupt.
